title: Small Bar, Limited Staffing
system_mod: Emphasize batching and limited labor feasibility. Avoid high-concept builds unless they are fast to execute.
venue_context: A 40-seat restaurant with a small L-shaped bar and only one bartender per shift. Menu needs to be prep-efficient, profitable, and executable without additional support.
prompt: How do we build a profitable cocktail menu for a one-bartender bar while keeping execution simple and fast?
